attributes.action: Say no to vaccines for children aged 12-16
attributes.additional_details: Delay until more research has been done
attributes.background: Recently Chris Whitty has said those between 12-16 should get vaccinated. Due to there being no long term data amongst other things, this petition is for people who disagree with children being vaccinated

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Do not vaccinate children against COVID-19 until Phase 3 trials are complete
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586017
